main.1: Swapster is a reliable crypto wallet and exchange that lets you store and swap crypto and withdraw fiat directly to a card — all without leaving Telegram.
main.4: Swapster transactions are completely free. Send any crypto to a friend in seconds with one click — just their ID.
main.6: Create a crypto wallet in TG right now!
main.7: Turn your TG account into a multi-currency wallet and exchange in just three clicks. Takes under 30 seconds.

card.0: Automatic payouts to accounts of Russian banks
card.01: With a TG crypto wallet, you don’t need to wait for funds like on exchanges. Payouts are instant. Save your cards for convenience and avoid re-entering numbers.
card.1: Profitable crypto exchange with low fees
card.02: No extra fees when converting crypto. Rates are fixed every 5 seconds and updated online.
card.2: Unified USDT balance across all networks with no fees
card.03: Send USDT via TRC20, ERC20, BEP20 from a single TG wallet. Received on one network? Send on another — no internal transfers needed.

card2.00: Accept most crypto assets from any wallets with zero fees

main2.1: The Swapster crypto wallet supports the most popular crypto assets and networks. Their number grows and is updated every day.
main2.2: Blockchains and Tokens Supported by the Wallet
main2.3: Bitcoin — the first digital currency, whose circulation is not regulated by any official authorities or payment systems. Bitcoin has its own public network — the blockchain. It is a kind of database that stores information about all transactions in chains. Anyone can view this information, but it cannot be changed or destroyed.

main3.0: Get a multi-currency crypto wallet in 2 clicks
main3.1: To connect Swapster you only need an active Telegram account. Open the link, start the bot — exchange crypto at market rates right in Telegram.
main3.5: Top up with BTC, ETH, BNB, USDT, USDC. In the TG bot tap “Top up”, choose currency, network, copy your wallet address.
main3.8: In the menu tap “Send”, choose currency, blockchain, enter address and amount.
main3.14: Withdraw to other wallets the same way: “Send”, currency, address, amount. Confirm — instant, receipt and tx hash provided.
main3.15: Below is a guide to selling crypto and cashing out to a bank card.
main3.17: Swapster is a wallet and an exchange inside Telegram. Swap crypto and rubles in 2 clicks.
main3.18: Open “Exchange”, pick what you sell and receive, enter the amount.

main4.0: How Swapster protects your crypto assets
main4.1: Swapster has a built-in reliability check. “Gray” and “black” assets are automatically stopped or returned. You can also request a manual check.
main4.3: AML (Anti-Money Laundering) means preventing the concealment of illegal fund origins.
main4.4: To run a check, open the main menu, select “AML”, choose the blockchain and the paying wallet. One AML check costs 1 USDT.
main4.6: You receive detailed results for the transaction or wallet.
